price: 70. Om daarmee degene die leven te waarschuwen en dat het woord (van Allah) tegen de ongelovigen rechtvaardig is.
arabic: لِّيُنذِرَ مَن كَانَ حَيّٗا وَيَحِقَّ ٱلۡقَوۡلُ عَلَى ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: liyundhira man kāna ḥayyan wayaḥiqqa al-qawlu ʿalā al-kāfirīna
